column1: in memory of terry webster -- mason funeral homes| first: last: born: august 15
column5: illinois this memorial provided by:mason funeral homes. metamora
column11: passed away at 9:44 a. m. on monday
column13: 2015 at unity. point methodist medical center in peoria. he was born on august 15
column14: 1949 in peoria to arnold and mary (cornwell) webster. he married kathy danz on october 10
column15: 1970 in east peoria. kathy survives. also surviving are their three children gary (jill goulden) webster of wyoming
column17: rick (mindy driscoll) webster of metamora and julie (rick) mc. cann of east peoria; one brother larry webster of east peoria; one sister pamela webster myers of peoria; and nine very special loving grandchildren. terry was preceded in death by his parents
column18: one brother elvis webster and two sisters carol miller and linda jo harazmus. after finishing high school
column19: terry went into the u. s. army for two years and had been stationed in korea. following the army
column20: terry went to work at caterpillar
column21: working most of that time in mossville in the engine department. he retired in 2010 after 36 years with caterpillar. terry loved retirement life for the past five years. he especially enjoyed the time spent with family
column22: doing woodworking projects for family members and playing the guitar. a service to celebrate terrys life will be held on thursday
column24: 2015 at 6:00 p. m. at mason funeral home germantown hills chapel with his son gary webster officiating. visitation will be on thursday starting at 4:00 p. m. until time of service. cremation rites will be accorded. in lieu of flowers
column25: memorials may be directed to childrens hospital of illinois in terrys memory. online condolences to the family may be made at masonfuneralhomes. com.
